ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound large shrimp in shells, peeled and deveined
¾ teaspoon sea salt (such as Diamond Crystal®)
½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

cookingTips: Pat shrimp completely dry; moisture prevents proper crisping and causes oil splatter
The simplicity of salt, pepper, and 5-spice means quality ingredients are essential
Fry at 375°F for 2-3 minutes; shrimp cook very quickly and can become tough if overcooked
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Coach the cook on the importance of drying shrimp thoroughly and using high heat for crispy, perfectly cooked results.
